This guide includes following sections.

A. How to setup cloud inference 
B. How to setup local inference



A. To setup cloud inference

1. Make sure to have the following 3 files in the same directory:
"yolo_grpc_client.py", 
"yolov5_service_pb2_grpc.py",
"yolov5_service_pb2.py"

2. Check port number





B. To setup local inference

1. Check and clone requirements file -> https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5
2. Install requirements
pip install -r requirements.txt  # install
